text: Weber State University is a public university in Ogden, Utah. The university has about 25,130 students. It was founded in 1889. The current president of the university is Brad L. Mortensen. ==Sports== The men's athletics teams of the university are called the Wildcats. They have 15 varsity teams and they compete in the Big Sky Conference. ==Other websites== *Weber State University's Official website *Weber State Wildcats' Official athletics website Category:Big Sky Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Utah Category:Ogden, Utah Category:1889 establishments in the United States
title: Weber State University
